archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.3.8c: c) recorded in one or more registers (e.g. a Configuration Management Database (CMDB) or a corporate asset register that contains details about both hardware and software).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
